mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fleetwood, or, The stain of birth: a novel of American life / by the author of "Philip in search of a wife," &c. &c
Fleetwood
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Sargent, Epes, 1813-1880 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Sabin and Wright attribute this work to Sargent; BAL was unable to confirm. [original]

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Third work in vol. with: Destiny, or, The chief's daughter / Susan Ferrier. Philadelphia, Lea and Blanchard, 1844 -- The crock of gold / Martin Farquhar Tupper. New York, Wiley & Putnam, 1845. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: United States--Social life and customs--Fiction
